00024 Element::Element() {
00025   this->strTagName = "" ;   // empty tag name
00026   this->nLineNo = -1 ;      // placeholder
00027   this->strContent = "" ;   // empty content
00028   // note that it is not necessary to initialize the vector of children
00029 } ;

00038   this->nLineNo = nLineNo ;
00039   this->strContent = "" ;   // empty content

00049 Element::Element( string strElementName, int nLineNo, string strContent ) {
00050   this->strTagName = strElementName ;
00051   this->nLineNo = nLineNo ;
00052   this->strContent = strContent ;   // empty content
00053   // note that it is not necessary to initialize the vector of children
00054 }
00055 
00060 string Element::toString() {
00061   // the following way to convert numbers to strings is "standard-compliant"
00062   //    see http://cplusplus.com/reference/clibrary/cstdlib/itoa/
00063   
00064   // convert the line number to a string
00065   char cstrLineNo[8] ;
00066   sprintf( cstrLineNo, "%d", nLineNo ) ;
00067   string strLineNo = cstrLineNo ;
00068 
00069   // convert the vector size (number of children) to a string
00070   char cstrVecSize[8] ;
00071   sprintf( cstrVecSize, "%d", vecChildren.size() ) ;
00072   string strVecSize = cstrVecSize ;
00073   
00074   return "Element \"" + strTagName + "\" was found at line " + strLineNo + 
00075       ( strContent.length() == 0 ? " with no content" : 
00076       " containing \"" + strContent + "\"" ) + " and " + strVecSize + 
00077       " child" + ( vecChildren.size() == 1 ? "" : "ren" ) + "." ;
00078 }
